text: Ernest Simoni Troshani (born 18 October 1928) is an Albanian cardinal of the Roman Catholic Church. He was created a cardinal in a consistory held on 19 November 2016 by Pope Francis. He was born in Troshani, Albania. ==References== ==Other websites== * * *Speech delivered in September 2014 during the visit of Pope Francis to Albania, Rome Reports, 17 November 2016 Category:1928 births Category:Living people Category:Cardinals of the Roman Catholic Church Category:Albanian people
title: Ernest Simoni
